Class Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Sebastian-Dan Basca This is the Data class used to load and save information about Tours,Reservations,Chauffeurs,Customers and Passengers
    See Also:
